title.narrative: Life in Lulu and Strengthening voices: Improving the capacity and resilience of the radio sector in South Sudan

description.narrative:
This project extends funding for Life in Lulu for 2 years; and in addition, BBC Media Action will build the capacity of community radio stations across South Sudan with a focus on to serving their communities sustainably and providing quality programming on key issues.
Stations will benefit from training delivered by international and local trainers to produce engaging and factually accurate programming that can become a trusted source of information for audiences and provide opportunities for discussion and participation. Training will include editorial, management and income generation to aim to provide stations with the skills necessary to operate in South Sudan’s environment.
